sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Generate Unique SN App Service ID</description>
        <name>Generate Unique SN App Service ID</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[		var tableName = "cmdb_ci_service_auto";
		var columnName = "number";
		var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		if(gr.isValid()){
		gr.addNullQuery(columnName);
		gr.orderBy("sys_created_on");
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()){
			var mgr = new NumberManager();
			gr.setValue(columnName, mgr.getNextNumber(tableName));
			gr.update();
		}}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-02-24 19:10:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1c8e69a3b743001012ec2970ee11a9eb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Generate Unique SN App Service ID</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1c8e69a3b743001012ec2970ee11a9eb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-02-24 19:10:53</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Generate Unique SN App Service ID
